full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 161 of 247 289 LBUVMAX4 Jane - direct had sexual contact with Jeffrey Epstein when you were 14 years old? 1 2 A. Yes. 3 Q. Who was most frequently in the room when you had sexual contact with Jeffrey Epstein when you were 14 years old? 4 5 A. Ghislaine Maxwell. 6 Q. I'd like to ask you to take a moment to look around the courtroom, and you can stand up if you need to if you can't see. Do you see Ghislaine Maxwell in the courtroom today? 7 8 9 A. Yes. 10 Q. Can you please point to where she's sitting and indicate an article of clothing that she's wearing. 11 12 A. Right there in the corner wearing a -- sort of a beige turtleneck. 13 14 MS. MOE: Your Honor, may the record reflect that the witness has identified the defendant? 15 16 THE COURT: It may so reflect. 17 Q. Now, I want to ask you more about that in a few moments, but first I want to take a step back. 18 19 Directing your attention to 1993, where were you living that year? 20 21 A. Palm Beach, Florida. 22 Q. How old were you in 1993? 23 24 A. Twelve, going on 13. 25 Q. I'd ask you to take a look at the binder in front of you. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00011933
